alert.note: Alert for Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 8:29PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Madison and southeastern Beaverhead Counties through 900 PM MDT... At 829 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northwest of Island Park Reservoir, or 14 miles northeast of Idmon, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Red Rock Pass and Raynolds Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
